name: region-to-share
summary: Draw and share a region of your screen using a transparent overlay
description:
RegionToShare is a lightweight Electron-based tool that allows users to draw and define a shareable region of the screen using a transparent overlay.

It can be useful for screen sharing, screen recording, or screenshot tools that need user-defined crop areas.

The app uses Electron's setIgnoreMouseEvents to allow click-through mode with a toggleable shortcut.

No personal data is collected. It runs entirely locally.
